author: Warhammer
description:
In this video, Adam explains everything you need to know about Armies on Parade, going over how to enter, the categories, prizes, and more. 

Find out more about Armies on Parade here: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/q7v6yat5/lvo-preview-2025-armies-on-parade-is-back-and-even-better/

If you're new to painting, check out our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist for an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

title: What is Armies on Parade?
